DataSourcePortable.Name: Logs do monitoramento
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT * 
 FROM Z_SYSTEMMONITOR " /> <Fields> <Field Alias="Z_GRUPO" From="A" Path="Z_GRUPO" /> <DateField Alias="DATA" From="A" Path="DATA" FieldDateFormat="DayMonthYear" FieldTimeFormat="HourMinuteSecond" /> <Field Alias="HOST" From="A" Path="HOST" /> <Field Alias="DESCRICAO" From="A" Path="DESCRICAO" /> <Field Alias="APLICACAO" From="A" Path="APLICACAO" /> <Field Alias="USUARIO" From="A" Path="USUARIO" /> <Field Alias="TIPO" From="A" Path="TIPO" /> <Field Alias="TEMPOSEGUNDOS" From="A" Path="TEMPOSEGUNDOS" /> <Field Alias="AGRUPADOR" From="A" Path="AGRUPADOR" /> <Field Alias="MODULO" From="A" Path="MODULO" /> <Field Alias="SUGESTAO" From="A" Path="SUGESTAO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
